name: Chocolate Chip Cake Mix Cookies
description: Whip up a batch of these scrumptious Chocolate Chip Cake Mix Cookies that are so easy, even a novice baker can master them! With a cake mix base and a handful of simple ingredients, you'll be enjoying these soft, chewy cookies in no time.
instructions: Combine cake mix, chocolate chips, oil, and eggs in a mixing bowl.
Using an ice cream scoop or your hand, form golf ball-sized balls of cookie dough and transfer to a parchment paper-lined baking sheet.
